Room.Name: A dark trail
Room.Description: The trees all around you howl as you walk on this dark and lonely trail. Leaves swirl in tornadoes and the wind tears at your clothing, making you want badly to rest on a nearby tree stump. High above dark clouds thunder and lightning crackles. You notice further to the north that the trail begins to ascend into the mountains.

Room.Name: A dark trail
Room.Description: The forest that once surrounded this trail seems less dense in this part. Rocks and boulders rest around you and loose dirts slides down the path leading up the mountain. Large howls from mountain wolves can be heard in the distance, though no direction can be guessed which way it actually originated from. To the south the trail continues while you may climb up the mountain here.

Room.Name: the mountain trail
Room.Description: The trail that leads around this mountain is very rocky and the loose dirt makes it increasingly difficult to walk. Few trees surround this trail and speckle the landscape below. Mostly pine, you notice that none have grown very well. The dark clouds above may be the reason, although you wonder what could be causing the constant darkness.

Room.Name: the mountain trail
Room.Description: The trail that leads around this mountain is very rocky and the loose dirt makes it increasingly difficult to walk. Few trees surround this trail and speckle the landscape below. Mostly pine, you notice that none have grown very well. The dark clouds above may be the reason, although you wonder what could be causing the constant darkness.

Room.Name: the mountain trail
Room.Description: The trail that leads around this mountain is very rocky and the loose dirt makes it increasingly difficult to walk. Few trees surround this trail and speckle the landscape below. Mostly pine, you notice that none have grown very well. The dark clouds above may be the reason, although you wonder what could be causing the constant darkness. You notice the trail leads down to a large clearing.

Room.Name: the mountain trail
Room.Description: The trail that leads around this mountain is very rocky and the loose dirt makes it increasingly difficult to walk. Few trees surround this trail and speckle the landscape below. Mostly pine, you notice that none have grown very well. The dark clouds above may be the reason, although you wonder what could be causing the constant darkness.

Room.Name: the clearing
Room.Description: Like the mountain above, the rocks here are scattered about the area. The clearing seems to look almost like the beginnings of a road leading north, where you notice a large town surrounded by an iron wall. You notice the weather above and around the town is just as it was leading here: cloudy and dark, although the mountains seem to look more inviting.

Room.Name: The south gate
Room.Description: At the gate of Varggin Shih you can already see the despair and darkness present in this city. An awful smell wafts in with the wind, making you gasp for fresh air. Heeps of dirty furs litter the inside of the gate, most likely for trade (although you aren't sure who would by such filthy things). The gate and the walls surrounding the city tower at a height close to around 20 feet.

Room.Name: the street of Varggin Shih
Room.Description: The street, like anything you see around you, smells. A dim glow illuminates the area from an unknown source. Various grunts and howls can be heard coming from the many homes that you see lining the street. You notice that there was some fur tossed to the side of the road, most likely the source of the horid smell.

Room.Name: the street of Varggin Shih
Room.Description: The street, like anything you see around you, smells. A dim glow illuminates the area from an unknown source. Various grunts and howls can be heard coming from the many homes that you see lining the street. You notice that there was some fur tossed to the side of the road, most likely the source of the horid smell.

Room.Name: A Small Home
Room.Description: This small home is large enough for one, maybe two trolls at most. It is pretty basic in it's furnishing: a bed, a kitchen/dining room "area" where a large table is, and a large hole in the floor where you assume the trolls throw waste and other things. Other than the blood stains covering the walls and carpet, this is exactly what an every-day troll would love.

Room.Name: A Small Home
Room.Description: This small home is large enough for one, maybe two trolls at most. Room.Description: This small home is large enough for one, maybe two trolls at most. Other than the blood stains covering the walls and carpet, this is exactly what an every-day troll would love.

Room.Name: Entrance to a Palace
Room.Description: Gold glitters around you and you feel out of place in this glorious foyer to the palace of the Varggin Shih. Paintings and murals depicting the history of this city hang in the hall, leaving you in awe and feeling almost out of place from the dark and lonely streets to the south. Torches hang in jewel-hilted hangers lightning the palace with a warm glow.

Room.Name: the Hallway
Room.Description: The palace is in much better condition than the rest of the city and you wonder how the citizens put up with the king. To the south the entrance glows with radiance and you almost question the fact that a troll lives here. To the east a strange smell emits from the darkness.

Room.Name: The Shaman's Room
Room.Description: This room is very dark and cold, lit only by a single torch that emits no heat. The walls are so black that it is difficult to discern exactly where they are. You can hear a low, moaning wind echoing from somewhere, carrying with it the faint whimpers much like that of a dying child, but the air here is dead, stale and lifeless, and there is no breeze to be felt.

Room.Name: the Hallway
Room.Description: No torches line this hallway and the glow from the south seems not as bright as it was. Large paintings of the king and some of his victorious battles adorn the walls, which are made of the blackest of onyx. To the north there is a large throne room where the king resides. To the south the palace extends.

Room.Name: The Throne Room
Room.Description: A raised dias occupies the center of this dismal place, and on the dias is a throne, constructed from countless humanoid bones and upholstered with human skin that still drips blood, creating small crimson pools on the smooth black marble floor that drain into a series of grates surrounding the throne.

Room.Name: the street of Varggin Shih
Room.Description: The street, like anything you see around you, smells. A dim glow illuminates the area from an unknown source. Various grunts and howls can be heard coming from the many homes that you see lining the street. You notice that there was some fur tossed to the side of the road, most likely the source of the horid smell.

Room.Name: the street of Varggin Shih
Room.Description: The street, like anything you see around you, smells. A dim glow illuminates the area from an unknown source. Various grunts and howls can be heard coming from the many homes that you see lining the street. You notice that there was some fur tossed to the side of the road, most likely the source of the horid smell.

Room.Name: A Small Home
Room.Description: This small home is large enough for one, maybe two trolls at most. It is pretty basic in it's furnishing: a bed, a kitchen/dining room "area" where a large table is, and a large whole in the floor where you assume the trolls throw waste and other things. Other than the blood stains covering the walls and carpet, this is exactly what an every-day troll would love.

It is pretty basic in it's furnishing: a bed, a kitchen/dining room "area" where a large table is, and a large whole in the floor where you assume the trolls throw waste and other things. NPC.name: disgusting troll warrior
NPC.description: Well-muscled and smelly like any other troll. An inhabitant of the dark town of Varggin Shih, he trains as a warrior in their small community.
NPC.longDescription: A large troll sniffs the air, preparing to attack his enemies!

NPC.name: strong troll archer
NPC.description: He is one of the great archers of Varggin Shih. His muscles glisten as he readies his bow for a battle, glaring at you with hatred.
NPC.longDescription: A large troll looks up at you and readies his bow!

NPC.name: strong troll guard
NPC.description: He is one of the few trolls who have trained their whole life to be guardian of the king and protector of his life. His muscles are large and his skin is tough. Perhaps you should rethink your plans...
NPC.longDescription: A large troll sneers at you, guarding the king's lair with his life.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: troll king
NPC.description: He is the king of this very dark and evil town. Having fought through the hardships of the troll plague so long ago, he began choosing the finest of troll fighters to join him in a village of luxury. No worries, no problems and no intruders. Now that the mountain pass that leads here has been found, though, his trolls have taken offense to the infidels.
NPC.longDescription: A huge troll growls and spits at you for interupting him!

NPC.name: troll citizen
NPC.description: He is large, well-muscled and ugly.
NPC.longDescription: A medium sized troll walks the streets of Varggin Shih here.

NPC.name: troll ranger
NPC.description: He is one of the trolls who has dedicated his life to the woods and all that it has to offer. Crude, disgusting plants sit around his home with their vines climbing up and down the walls. He prepares to defend his home against the intruders.
NPC.longDescription: A large troll ranger looks up at your entrance and attacks!

NPC.name: troll shaman Haggin
NPC.description: He is one of the darkest looking trolls you have ever seen. Fur that is black as midnight and a demonic glare in his eyes that sends chills up your spine. Haggin the shaman has known the king of this town for most of his adult life, having joined him in a crusade against a village or two they live in luxury.
NPC.longDescription: A large shaman stands here chanting spells at any who oppose him.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive Undead Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: Sanctuary ProtectionGood Flying PassDoor Regeneration DetectIllusion

Item.Name: blood-covered blood axe
Item.LongDescription: A blood-covered axe is here.

Item.Name: deadly bow
Item.LongDescription: A deadly bow rests here in a pool of blood.

Item.Name: signet ring
Item.LongDescription: A silver ring is here, the signet of Varggin Shih adorns it.

Item.LongDescription: A crude-looking iron belt is here.

Item.LongDescription: A dirty helm of blackened furs is here.

Item.LongDescription: Some blood-covered battle armor is here.

Item.Name: potion smelly strange
Item.LongDescription: A strange smelly potion is here.

Item.Name: wicked iron longsword
Item.LongDescription: A wicked iron longsword is here.

Item.Name: staff zargg troll
Item.LongDescription: A large staff is here.

Item.Name: potion strange black
Item.LongDescription: A strange black potion is here.

Item.LongDescription: A pile of bones is here.

Item.LongDescription: A pile of bones is here.

Item.LongDescription: A pile of bones is here.

Item.LongDescription: A pile of bones is here.

Item.LongDescription: A large iron bracelet is here.

Item.Name: skull cracked
Item.ShortDescription: the cracked skull of the shaman of Varggin Shih
Item.LongDescription: A cracked skull of the shaman of Varggin Shih is here.

Item.Name: strange bone
Item.LongDescription: A strange looking bone is humming here.

Item.Name: fur leggings
Item.LongDescription: A pile of tough-looking fur is here.
